T02D2806:164a-0: @164a * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po rab tu snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2806:164a-1: ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba nges par
T02D2806:164a-2: mi shes pas ci bya gtol med par gyur te
T02D2806:164a-3: ldongs pa rnams kyis 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
T02D2806:164a-4: thugs rje chen po rab tu snang mdzad la re
T02D2806:164a-5: ba bskyed la / zhag gsum mam gnyis sam gcig
T02D2806:164a-6: gi bar du yid la byed pa gcig dang mi
T02D2806:164a-7: 'bral bas rig pa bzla zhing smyung bar gnas par
T02D2806:164a-8: ba bskyed la / bya'o // tadya th'a /
T02D2806:164a-9: na ma:shr'i a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02D2806:164a-11: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D2806:164a-14: sarba buddha dzny'a na garbhe tishtha tishtha ma ma sa pan tvoshtha pra darsha h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2806:164a-15: 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la //
T02D2806:164a-16: me tog dkar po sogs bdug bcas //
T02D2806:164a-17: mchod pa mang pos nyer mchod cing //
T02D2806:164a-18: phyag 'tshal kun tu bskor bar bya //
T02D2806:164a-20: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos po bzhi //
T02D2806:164b-0: man ngag bzhin @164b du ri mor dgod //
T02D2806:164b-1: ge sar rang sems me long ngo //
T02D2806:164b-2: de nas lhag pa'i lha dran pas //
T02D2806:164b-3: sdig pa la sogs pa bsal nas ni //
T02D2806:164b-4: 'phags pa'i zhabs la mgo gtugs la //
T02D2806:164b-5: snang ba gsal pos snyoms par 'jug / sangs rgyas sras po thugs rje can //
T02D2806:164b-6: kun mkhyen lus can kun don bsgrub //
T02D2806:164b-7: 'od ldan yul la rtags skugs ltar //
T02D2806:164b-8: dus drug gzigs des mkhyen pa 'jug / tho rangs dge slong dkar po dang //
T02D2806:164b-9: padmo'i rtags can bud med kyis //
T02D2806:164b-10: 'dod pa'i don gang yod pa de //
T02D2806:164b-11: me long nang gi gzugs ltar ston //
